issuesJson.title: Awesome Book
issuesJson.bodyHTML:
• List of Free Learning Resources In Many Languages - üìö Freely available programming books

FE

  • You Don't Know JS Yet (book series) - 2nd Edition - This is a series of books diving deep into the core mechanisms of the JavaScript language.
  • JavaScript for impatient programmers (ES2022 edition) - This book makes JavaScript less challenging to learn for newcomers, by offering a modern view that is as consistent as possible.
  • Speaking JavaScript: An In-Depth Guide for Programmers - This book has been written for programmers, by a programmer. The book‚Äôs target audience is programmers who want to learn JavaScript quickly and properly, and JavaScript programmers who want to deepen their skills and/or look up specific topics.
